data source : https://www.kaggle.com/kimjihoo/coronavirusdataset

possible use dataset
policy, searchtrend, TimeProvince

load the required library
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

set seed and read data
```{r}
set.seed(4011)
file_path = "C:/Users/cheng/OneDrive/Desktop/hw/STAT4011/dataset"
case =  read.csv(paste0(file_path, '/Time.csv'))
policy = read.csv(paste0(file_path, '/Policy.csv'))
```


merge and plot
```{r}
a = merge(case, policy, by.x='date', by.y='start_date', all = TRUE)
qplot(x = date, y=confirmed, data = a, geom=c("point", "line"))
plot(x = a$date, y=a$confirmed)
```
